title: This new banning system
body:
is quite honestly the greatest thing to ever happen to this planet and almost makes up for the atrocious client that was shoved down every1s throats 

every person gets their own ban now at the beginning of the selection process therefore i take great delight in knowing that i will never ever play a game with yasuo in it ever again (get it? cuz i ban him every single time hahaha) 

wow im so thrilled thank you riot i love you and i love everyone here have a great evening <3

replies.body: I feel the same way and even though it can be annoying when your ban is the same as some one else on the enemy team, I still love the way the new ban system is. Yes in most cases you will have a double ban on the same champion but unless 4 champions on both teams are banned by both sides, we still end up with more than our original 6. So I don't know why people are always complaining that we don't always have 10 bans lol

I like how it is a LOT faster to get through the banning phase, even with 4 additional bans (2 from each team more than previously).
I also don't have to deal with Zac again untill his nerfs come through.
